parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current muzzle of unit's weapon.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command will return 0 [[Number]] if given object  is a unit that is in a vehicle.<br>
You can alternatively use <code>_muzzle <template><title>=</title></template> [[weaponState]] [[player]] select 1;</code></value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''currentMuzzle''' gunner

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> gunner: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - current muzzle

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_muzzle = [[currentMuzzle]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_muzzle = [[currentMuzzle]] ([[gunner]] ([[vehicle]] [[player]]));</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[currentWeapon]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
